languages.text: "Довольно, Энрих. Лорд-капитан сам{mf||а} решит, что истина, а что — нет".
"Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."
languages.original_text: "Довольно, Энрих. Лорд-капитан сам{mf||а} решит, что истина, а что — нет".

traits.locale_text: "Enough, Enrich. The Lord Captain will decide for {mf|himself|herself} what's true and what isn't."
"Enough, Enrich. The Lord Captain will decide for {mf|himself|herself} what's true and what isn't."
"Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."
"Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."
"Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."
"Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

languages.text: « Ça suffit, Einrich. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} décidera {mf|lui|elle}-même de la véracité de ces dires. »
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, Einrich. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} décidera {mf|lui|elle}-même de la véracité de ces dires. »

languages.text: «Basta, Einrich. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán decidirá personalmente si estas declaraciones son ciertas».
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: «Basta, Einrich. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán decidirá personalmente si estas declaraciones son ciertas».

languages.text: “够了，艾因里奇。舰长大人会亲自判断这些说辞是真是假。”
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: “够了，艾因里奇。舰长大人会亲自判断这些说辞是真是假。”

languages.text: 「もう十分だ、アインリッヒ。ロード・キャプテンがこれらの発言の真実を確認する」
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: 「もう十分だ、アインリッヒ。ロード・キャプテンがこれらの発言の真実を確認する」

languages.text: "Genug, Einrich. Der Lord Captain entscheidet selbst, ob diese Behauptungen wahr sind."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: "Genug, Einrich. Der Lord Captain entscheidet selbst, ob diese Behauptungen wahr sind."

languages.text: "Bu kadar yeter Einrich. Bu iddiaların hakikatine Lord Kaptan bizzat karar verecek."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Einrich. The Lord Captain will decide the truth of these claims for {mf|himself|herself}."
